title: Sinema Bill on Firefighter Pay Is “Slap in the Face” to Workers Battling Blazes
description:
Biden’s 2021 funding boost for federal wildland firefighters is set to lapse, and Sen. Kyrsten Sinema’s proposal would give them a major pay cut.

The post Sinema Bill on Firefighter Pay Is “Slap in the Face” to Workers Battling Blazes appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Meet the Man Driving the Right’s Culture War Panic
description:
Conservative activist Christopher Rufo says the left has won America’s culture wars. He aims to reverse it.

The post Meet the Man Driving the Right’s Culture War Panic appeared first on The Intercept.
